channel.title: VirtualBox on BartekR
channel.description: Recent content in VirtualBox on BartekR

item.title: Connect to SQL Server on Ubuntu Linux VirtualBox machine
item.description: For my everyday tests with SQL Server I use VirtualBox. SQL Server 2017 is/will be a huge thing - mostly because it will be available on Linux. If so - I should get comfortable with using it on Linux. I start with Ubuntu Server (because of the name - I used Ubuntu Desktop in the past), Installation of VM on VirtualBox comes down to adding ISO image as the CD-ROM (DVD-ROM?
